definitions.definition: A machine with sharp rotating blades in a bowl, for mashing , crushing , or liquefying food ingredients.
A piece of fabric sewn into the front of a theatrical wig to make it blend in with the performer's natural hair.
A subtly patterned fabric printed in different shades of a single color, often used in place of a solid to create visual texture.

main_definition: A machine with sharp rotating blades in a bowl, for mashing , crushing , or liquefying food ingredients.
secondary_definitions: ( theater ) A piece of fabric sewn into the front of a theatrical wig to make it blend in with the performer's natural hair.
( quilting ) A subtly patterned fabric printed in different shades of a single color, often used in place of a solid to create visual texture.
